sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { View, Text, TouchableHighlight } from 'react-native'
import NavigationBar from '../components/NavigationBar'

export default function NightTimePage() {
  const [step, setStep] = useState(1)
  return (
    <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
      <View style={{ flex: 9 }}>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: '#cc0066' }}>
          <Text>
            {getText(step)}
          </Text>
        </View>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, backgroundColor: 'white' }}>
          <TouchableHighlight style={{ width: '100%', height: '100%', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }} 
          onPress={() => { setStep(step + 1)}}>
            <Text>Click Me</Text>
          </TouchableHighlight>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <NavigationBar previousPage='ItemsPage' nextPage=''></NavigationBar>
      </View>
    </View>
  )
}

function getText(step:number) {
  let text = ''
  switch (step) {
    case 1:
      text = text1
      break;
    case 2:
      text = text2
      break;
    case 3:
      text = text3
      break;
  }
  return text
}

const text1 = '“Mm, ahem, this is a school announcement. It is now 10 p.m. As such, it is officially nighttime. \
Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don’t let the bed bugs bite…” \
\n\n \
Press button below when ready'

const text2 = 'Traitors - Wake up. Press the button below to reveal who the Blackened player is'

const text3 = 'Blackened - Wake up. Place the bullet card in front of the player you would like to attack. \
On Night 0, the victim will only lose an item card and not be killed. Press the button below when you are done'
